  1. A tension exists between making web sites appear visually native to the user’s OS and uniquely branded sites. The graveyard of projects that tried to conquer the former is vast. The latter is more sustainable. BUT—browsers managing this for us with system-ui is great 👍
    On twitter.com ♻️ 1 Retweets ❤️ 19 Favorites 2018 Mar 29 Mood +6 🙂
